sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SARMENTOSAE (from ſarmentum, a long ſhoot like that of a vine); the name of the 11th claſs in Linnaeus’s Fragments of a Natural Method, conſiſting of plants which have climbing ſtems and branches, that, like the vine, attach themſelves to the bodies in their neighbourhood for the purpoſe of ſupport. See Botany, p. 459,
